sentences.sContent: Therefore, lots of pavements need to repair in large. scale even repave wholly after using a long time, which will bring large numbers of waste asphalt mixture.
sentences.sContent_eng: Therefore, lots of pavements need to repair in large. scale even repave wholly after using a long time, which will bring large numbers of waste asphalt mixture.
sentences.sCn: 因此，沥青路面使用一定年限后必须进行大面积的维修，甚至全路段铣刨，重新铺筑。
